**Carrier details**

- **Country:** [e.g. Austria]
- **Carrier name:** [e.g. A1]
- **Is MVNO?** [Yes/No]
- **Parent MNO (if MVNO):** [e.g. A1, Magenta, Drei]
- **Full MVNO or Reseller MVNO:** [Full/Reseller/Unknown]
- **Country Code (CC):** [e.g. 01, 11]
- **Bands confirmed working:** [e.g. 3, 7, 20]
- **APN:** [e.g. webapn.at]
- **Supported:** [Yes/No/Partial]

**Additional notes**

Add any relevant notes, limitations, or caveats you observed when using this carrier.
